R = r/rvir, cvir = rvir / rs, x = r/rs.

compute_hod_old.compute_HOD_parameters(ngal=None, M1_over_Mmin=None, M0_over_M1=None, alpha=None, siglogM=None, f_cen=None, mass_tabulated=None, massfun_tabulated=None, logMmin_guess=13.5)[source]¶

Compute the physical (Msun h^-1) HOD parameters from ratios of masses and the desired number density of galaxies.

compute_hod_old.compute_linear_bias(m_halo, k, P, omega_m=None)[source]¶

compute the linear bias for halos of mass logMmin based on the Tinker+ 2010 fitting function.

compute_hod_old.compute_linear_bias_ying(m_halo, k, P, omega_m=None)[source]¶

ying’s code.

compute_hod_old.compute_ngal(logM, dM, mass_function, logMmin, M1_over_Mmin, M0_over_M1, alpha, siglogM, f_cen)[source]¶

compute number density from HOD.

compute_hod_old.compute_peak_height(m_halo, k, P, omega_m)[source]¶

compute peak height for a halo of mass m_halo given a (z=0) power spectrum P(k). sigma^2 = (1/2pi^2) int P(k) W^2(kR) k^2 dk.

compute_hod_old.compute_xi_1halo(rbins, N_of_M, Ncen_of_M, Nsat_of_M, cM=None, dndm=None, Omega_M=None, redshift=None, mass_tab=None)[source]¶

compute 1halo power spectrum given a function N(M) ‘N_of_M’ that gives the HOD: P_gg,1h(k) = (1/n_g^2) int_0^inf 0.5*(N_of_M(M)*(N_of_M(M)-1)) W^2(k,M) (dn/dM) dM

compute_hod_old.compute_xi_2halo(rbins, N_of_M, k=None, Pk=None, dndm=None, mass_tab=None, redshift=None, Omega_M=None, biasfun=None)[source]¶

compute 2-halo term from an HOD, bias-mass relation, and a linear Pk.

compute_hod_old.count_censat_pairs(x, y, z, rbins)[source]¶
compute_hod_old.count_satsat_pairs[source]¶

count pairs x,y,z into bins rbins.

compute_hod_old.differential_pair_count_NFW(x, c1, c2)[source]¶
compute_hod_old.differential_pair_count_NFW_allterms(x, c1, c2)[source]¶

from Appendix A of Zheng & Weinberg (2007).

compute_hod_old.differential_pair_count_NFW_samec(s, c)[source]¶

compute differential pair count at separation s = r/Rvir using Sheth et al. 2001 [MNRAS 325, 1288-1302] formula. [c = Rvir/rs].

compute_hod_old.dln_sigma_inv_dM(k, P, M=None, Omega_M=None)[source]¶

compute d ln sigma^-1 / dM analytically.

compute_hod_old.dndm_tinker(M, z=None, P=None, Omega_M=None)[source]¶
compute_hod_old.dndm_tinker_all(M, z=None, k=None, P=None, Omega_M=None)[source]¶

analytic fitting formula for mass function from Tinker+ 2008 as a function of redshift and Delta_vir.
